OOC: Are the decepticons in their base?


Artemis:

Artemis followed Decepticons in her futuristic-car mode



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Slugslinger looked on anxiously at Tremor. He wanted to desperatly
> follow, to a safer place, he tried to follow, but he couldnt 
follow. He
> couldnt transform to save his life, when he then felt a searing 
pain in
> his main structure that told him that his thoughts were becoming 
true.
> He looked on, as Grimlock poured the heat on, beginning to melt his
> frame, and he screamed loudly, his pain filled voice echoing over 
the
> mountain range, animals scattering from the unpleasant noise.
> 
> Caliburst looked back from the back of Tremor, "Slugslinger" he
> whispered, worried for his partner's condition. All he could hear 
was
> Apeface's reply.
> 
> "Understood." it told Tremor.
